lines.text: Light the candle at the bottom of your heart.
I have seen paradise. There is a future beyond the Earth.
[Nervously draws a swastika on the wall]
You've got hundreds of roses in your mouth.
I promise nothing, I do what I can. Their fate, however, lies in God's hands.
So it is God's fault they die.
Who ever wants to build a New World must first destroy the old!
Take from life what is pure. For living what is sufficient. Ghayat al Hakim
